title: Boredom
lyrics:
This song is about a stagnant relationship. It’s featured on Muse’s Newton Abbot Demo. A short snippet of the song recorded at Budstock 1997 surfaced in 2005.
[Verse 1]
We should be in the summer spirit
But it might as well be rain
We should be having such a good time
But I'm so bored it's causing me pain
[Pre-Chorus]
My dear
This love is dead
Somehow, someway
You'll come away
With you it's dead
[Chorus]
I can't let you pretend
These days
(These days)
Are the best you've had
Doesn't matter cause I love you
[Verse 2]
Stop telling me to try and cheer up
I just don't wanna be here
We should be having such a good time
But you're no good
No, you are going blind

[Pre-Chorus]
My dear
This love is dead
There's no way
You'll come away
With you it's dead
[Chorus]
I can't let you pretend
These days
(These days)
Are the best you've had
[Outro]
My dear, this love is dead
Somehow, someway
You'll come away
